parameters.definition: Hours worked per shift by staff teachers
Payment per shift for staff teachers
Hours worked per shift by substitute teachers
Payment per shift for substitute teachers
Total required teaching hours for the summer term

description: A school employs staff and substitute teachers. Per shift, staff teachers work \param{HoursStaff} hours and get paid \param{PayStaff}. Per shift, substitute teachers work \param{HoursSub} hours and get paid \param{PaySub}. For the summer term, the school requires \param{TotalHours} hours of teaching availability. If the school has a budget of \param{Budget}, how many of each teacher should be hired to minimize the total number of teachers?
